## WebServer.enableLocalSSL() method

Closes the existing http server and creates a new HTTPS server. This is intended for local development without a reverse proxy. Usage of this method will be ignored in production.

**Signature:**

```typescript
enableLocalSSL(): void;
```
**Returns:**

void
